local_intent: Align yaw to 90 degrees and execute two 0.1 m pushes at 180 deg on the cloth, verifying visibility before and after.
assumptions: Cloth is visible and reachable; approach avoids table collision
coherence_with_global: Uses ApproachAndAlign then SetTCPYaw=90, repeats Push twice with distance=0.1 and direction=180, matching the global push phase and binned parameters; verifies visibility before and after.
